data.title: Lotus Elise
data.subtitle: 1.8 2dr
data.description: Full service history (lotus or lotus approved).Not driven for several years garaged in the meantime. Cobalt blue one of the original S2 models from first waitlist (end of Y registration 2001). Rover K series engine. Sports touring pack. Never tracked. Blue leather interior. Passed MOT after service in September 2019 garaged since then. Has had correct service schedule AAB AAC and then A in September 2019. That service also included 2 new front tyres and full set of brake pads and discs. Rear tyres good condition. MOT current valid for another year from 12th July. Car will remain SORN until sold. Used so some wear and tear like gear knob badge missing and scuff mark on driver side leather door panel see photos. Some cosmetic chips and cracks on fibreglass. See photos. NOT from high impact.  Drives beautifully. Sad to see it go! Blue, 1 owner, £15,800

data.title: Lotus Elise
data.subtitle: 1.6 Euro 5 2dr
data.description: This beautiful Lotus Elise has only 1 previous owner from new, the first owner had the car for 3 years, the current owner owned the car for just over 9 years. It comes with every single service invoice and has been maintained to the highest of standards throughout its life. This gentleman kept the Lotus in a garage and never used it in the rain or even if it was even slightly damp. It was his dream car  and he was going to keep it for life, unfortunately he now has back problems and just physically could not use the car hence his reluctant sale. This is one of the rare first Series 3 models with only 5 currently for sale on AutoTrader (6 including this one). The main difference you'll find between the series 2 and 3 is build quality, lotus continually improve build quality so newer models will appear better built, less rattles, less leaks and a better-quality interior. Service History: (1) 988 Miles-Lotus-Run-In service, (2) 5,769 Miles-Lotus, (3) 10,598 Miles-Lotus, (4) 11,295 Miles-Lotus, (5) 19,687 Miles-Specialist, (6) 29,008 Miles-Specialist, (7) 36,750 Miles-Specialist, (8) 44,728 Miles-Specialist, (9) 51,435 Miles-Specialist, (10) 66,008 Miles-Specialist. ANY PART EXCHANGE IS WELCOME; MODERN, RETRO, CLASSIC, AND EVEN BIKES! CALL US TODAY TO GET A PART-EX QUOTE! VIEWING IS STRICTLY APPOINTMENT ONLY. PLEASE CALL IN ADVANCE SO WE CAN BOOK YOU IN, ENSURE THE CAR IS ON-SITE AND READY TO BE VIEWED. 6 MONTHS BRONZE WARRANTY, EXTENDED WARRANTY UP TO 3 YEARS PLATINUM+ AVAILABLE THROUGH WARRANTYWISE (HAND-WRITTEN JUST FOR US, NO OTHER DEALER OFFERS THIS COVER, ESPECIALLY ON OUR OLDER PORSCHES), HPI CLEAR, AND 1 YEAR AA BREAKDOWN COVER, 5 DAYS DRIVE AWAY INSURANCE (SUBJECT TO APPLICATION) AND VEHICLE TRACKING SOLUTIONS. £100 OF EVERY SALE IS DONATED TO CHARITY. FINANCE AVAILABLE AT COMPETITIVE RATES. ALL MAJOR CREDIT AND DEBIT CARDS ACCEPTED. WE ARE OPEN 7 DAYS A WEEK. CM22 7AA BISHOP'S STORTFORD , White, £21,995

data.title: Lotus Elise
data.subtitle: 1.8 111S 2dr
data.description: All stainless steel exhaust-Fitted before I owned it. Elise Parts induction kit. Elise parts sport cat. Elise Parts tripple pass all welded radiator. Head gasket changed 2014 Hamish Lindsey Motorsport. Air Con does not work. Grey, 3 owners, £17,500
